name: Leslie Hawthorn
biography: Leslie Hawthorn has more than 10 years experience in high tech project management, marketing and public relations. She currently works as a consultant specializing in business development and marketing for early stage startups. Leslie previously worked as a Program Manager for Google’s Open Source Programs Office, where she was responsible for the company’s FOSS outreach efforts, most notably the Google Summer of Code program and Google Highly Open Participation contest.
